arts.ttl: Kieffer Moore hat-trick brings Coventry’s unbeaten run to an end at Wrexham
arts.sum: Kieffer Moore downed Coventry with a perfect second-half hat-trick as Wrexham won 3-2 to inflict a first league defeat on the Championship leaders. Coventry, the only unbeaten side in the EFL, were closing in on a club-record seventh straight league win when Ephron Mason-Clark superbly slotted the Sky Blues ahead midway through the first half. The omens were not good for Wrexham given Frank Lampard’s side had scored 34 goals in 12 games before arriving in north Wales and the home side had won only one of their previous seven. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Kieffer Moore’s hat-trick ends Coventry’s unbeaten start to Championship season
arts.sum: The striker scored a perfect hat-trick after half-time to end Coventry’s run of six wins in a row and their unbeaten start

arts.ttl: Wrexham stun Lampard's Coventry thanks to Moore hat trick
arts.sum: Kieffer Moore downed Coventry with a perfect second-half hat-trick as Wrexham won 3-2 to inflict a first league defeat on the Championship leaders.

arts.ttl: LIVE: Wrexham take on Frank Lampard's Coventry at the Racecourse
arts.sum: Phil Parkinson's Wrexham welcome Coventry, who are unbeaten and flying high this season under Frank Lampard. ESPN has updates.

arts.ttl: All 12 Championship weekend games predictions - Week 13
arts.sum:
Frank Lampard's Coventry kick off the weekend schedule knowing victory at Wrexham on Friday sends them six points clear at the top of the Championship — for 24 hours at least.

That is one of 12 matches in a full weekend Championship programme and here are our thoughts on all of them.

arts.ttl: Frank Lampard gets honest with thoughts clear on Ryan Reynolds and Wrexham
arts.sum: Chelsea legend Frank Lampard has shared his feelings on Wrexham's rise under Ryan Reynolds and Rob Mac as his Coventry side travel to face the Red Dragons in the Championship

arts.ttl: How Wrexham have already annoyed Frank Lampard this season before Coventry clash
arts.sum: Wrexham face a tough test in the Championship as league leaders Coventry arrive in North Wales, but the Red Dragons did score one victory over manager Frank Lampard in the summer

arts.ttl: Pain of cup exit fuels Wrexham for Coventry test
arts.sum: Phil Parkinson hopes Wrexham can use the pain of their EFL Cup exit to Cardiff City as fuel for their mouthwatering contest with Championship leaders Coventry City on Friday.

arts.ttl: Wrexham vs Coventry - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Championship clash between Wrexham and Coventry City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
